title:
An open subset of the variety of $n$- dimensional algebras,
  classification and automorphisms
abstract:
Classification, up to isomorphism, of algebras from a non-empty subset of the
variety of $n$- dimensional algebras is presented. It is shown that these
algebras have only trivial automorphism and if the basic field is algebraically
closed then it is an open dense subset of the variety of $n$- dimensional
algebras. Properties of these sets, depending on $n$, with respect to the
direct sum and tensor product are considered. Moreover one more way of
construction of such subsets with similar properties is considered as well.
